<<<<<<< HEAD
A learned treatise of the Sabaoth, written by Mr Edward Brerewood, professor in Gresham Colledge, London. To Mr Nicolas Byfield, preacher in Chester. With Mr Byfields answere and Mr Brerewoods reply Learned treatise of the Sabbath Brerewood, Edward, 1565?-1613. Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622. aut
[4], 101, [1] p.
Printed by Iohn Lichfield printer to the famous Vniversity, for Thomas Huggins, At Oxford : An. Dom. 1630.
"Mr Byfields ansvvere with Mr Brerevvoods reply" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous. Subsequent editions published as: A learned treatise of the Sabbath. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
